meanings.definition: A small bag or pouch used for carrying money and small personal items.
meanings.sent1: I keep my coins and keys in my pocketbook.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her pocketbook when she goes shopping.
meanings.sent3: When I opened my pocketbook, a tiny toy fell out!
meanings.sent4: Her pocketbook was a treasure trove of memories.
meanings.sent5: The pocketbook jingled with loose change.

meanings.sent1: Her pocketbook matched her outfit perfectly.
meanings.sent2: She left her pocketbook on the chair while she went to get coffee.
meanings.sent3: The cat jumped into the open pocketbook and made itself comfortable.
meanings.sent4: Her pocketbook was a bottomless pit of essentials.
meanings.sent5: The pocketbook swung elegantly from her arm as she walked.
